category.name: General

preference.name: TC_NX_Allow_Deepcopy
preference.preference_description: Determines whether deep copy functionality is supported with Teamcenter Integration for NX. Valid Values: true - Deep copy functionality is supported with Teamcenter Integration for NX. false - Deep copy functionality is not supported with Teamcenter Integration for NX.
